meanings.sent1: After the war, the town was repeopled with new families.
meanings.sent2: The village was repeopled after the construction of new homes.
meanings.sent3: The empty school was repeopled with students eager to learn.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was repeopled with joy after a long period of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The garden was repeopled with colorful flowers in the spring.

meanings.sent1: The stadium was repeopled with cheering fans for the championship game.
meanings.sent2: The once deserted streets were repeopled with residents returning home.
meanings.sent3: The haunted house was repeopled with curious visitors on Halloween night.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was repeopled with memories of her childhood home.
meanings.sent5: The library was repeopled with book lovers on the weekend.
